name: Arena Of Ascension
description:
You were offered a chance to become a god. All you need to do is win the deadly arena organized by the god themselves. But remember, the gods are unpredictable and they would do anything for their entertainment.

CONTROLS:
Movement: W, A, S, D
Rotation: Mouse
Slash: Left mouse button
Shoot: Space

TEAM: 
We are a bunch of geeks and nerds whose dream is to make computer games. 
Jiří Filek: Programming, Balancing, Game testing
Martina Fusková: UI, Writing, Sound design
Eve: Graphics
Martin: Animations

DEVELOPMENT:
This game was developed in 48 hours as a submission to the GMTK Game Jam 2020. It is based on the theme 'Out of Control' - where the out of control elements are the gods. 
The code, the artwork and the soundtrack were done by us during the 48 hours. The sound effects were downloaded from https://freesound.org/home/ and then edited (also during the jam).

FURTHER DEVELOPMENT:
We are planning to continue in the development of this game. We would like to improve the visuals of the UI, add animations for the gods and replace the events UI by audio of the gods. If you have any recommendations for the game, please leave a comment.
